description: The average accuracy of each stat in the Data Lake as outputted by the KS Diff Tool, grouped by week

schema.name: year
schema.description: The year the data points used for the weekly accuracy are from.

schema.name: week_number
schema.description: The week of the year the data points used for the weekly accuracy are from. Starts at 1 and can end at 53

schema.name: start_date
schema.description: The first date for any data point collected in the sample for this week

schema.name: end_date
schema.description: The last date for any data point collected in the sample for this week

schema.name: table_name
schema.description: The name of the table in the Data Lake under the kinesisstats schema (i.e the name of the stat type) that this weekly accuracy is for

schema.name: weekly_accuracy
schema.description: The weekly accuracy, as a percent in range of 0-1 (e.g .95 means 95%)

schema.name: weekly_total_count
schema.description: The total number of data points (i.e rows) sampled in this week
